Lafayette.Purdue Bell Tower:
The Purdue Bell Tower was constructed in 1995, at Purdue University, through a gift from the class of 1948.


== Heavilon Hall Tower ==
The current Bell Tower's inspiration comes from the bell tower that was part of the old Heavilon Hall, demolished in 1956. Heavilon Hall was dedicated on January 19, 1894, as part of Purdue's Engineering School.
